songs.title: Molotov Cocktail Party (Desde El Palacio De Los Deportes)
songs.album: ¿Dónde Jugarán Lxs Niñxs? Desde El Palacio De Los Deportes
songs.lyrics:
[Letra de Molotov Cocktail Party (Desde El Palacio De Los Deportes)]

[Intro]
One
Haha
I'm definitely in da house

[Verso 1 Randy Ebright]
I'll rip your head off and I'm defecate down your neck
You better alejate because I don't give a heck
You can't understand how I kicks my lingo
You better step back because here comes the pinche gringo

In your face that's right I'm freestylin'
Doing it with ease all the while your tryin'
To be like me
I can't understand why you can't be your own man

People try to deal with the style I got
Don't you know I'm doin' it without coke or pot
I'm naturally kind a fucked up like that
You know what I'm saying

[Coro]
M to da O to da L to da O to da T to da O to da V
For those illiterate bastards who cannot spell
A Molotov is so we be
M to da O to da L to da O to da T to da O to da V
For those illiterate bastards who cannot spell
A Molotov is so we be

[Verso 2  Randy Ebright]]
Molotov shit is so tight
Much, much stronger than any dynamite
Slick is the way we're movin'
Funky as shit is the way it's groovin'

Gasoline in a coke bottle
You get all pissed while we turn up the throttle
Plug it up with a gas drenched rag
I don't run away 'cause I'd rather let my pants sag

Get out the lighter and set it on fire
Watch it as I throw it getting brighter, brighter and brighter
Contact was made with the opposing objective
You went from something to nothing in just under a second

[Coro]
M to da O to da L to da O to da T to da O to da V
For those illiterate bastards who cannot spell
A Molotov is so we be
M to da O to da L to da O to da T to da O to da V
For those illiterate bastards who cannot spell
A Molotov is so we be

[Verso 3]
They call us Molotov because we explode on sight
Keep on talkin' shit if you're looking for a fight
Your mouth keeps movin but all I hear is noise
If you fuckin' with the Gringo you better go get your boys
Mickey, Pac & Tito, yo, they got my back
If you think you bad enough we'll put you down that smack
Believe it or not what I'm motherfuckin' saying
Don't be stupid kid cause I ain't motherfuckin' playing

[Coro]
M to da O to da L to da O to da T to da O to da V
For those illiterate bastards who cannot spell
A Molotov is so we be
M to da O to da L to da O to da T to da O to da V
For those illiterate bastards who cannot spell
A Molotov is so we be
M to da O to da L to da O to da T to da O to da V
For those illiterate bastards who cannot spell
A Molotov is so we be



[Outro]
Chida la Banda
Ahuevo
